entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High 9.
